name: CRAZY TWIST
description:
Crazy Twist is funny mobile casual game, not only addictive but mind relaxing as well. Crazy Twist is a game with simple game play having a rotation ball in the middle of the screen which tends to rotate all the time, Some crazy pins are already hugged the center ball, all you have to do is just to launch the pin on right time so it may not to collide with other crazy pins but meet the empty area on circle itself.
Players must be attentive while launching radiant ball to the rotation ball one after another. As the game play proceed, the needle pins will increase in number and less space would be left to cover at the right place on rotational ball, to make it more challenging for you the rotation ball may be vary in speed some time it moves quickly or may be slowly, in this way it became harder to master as you proceed the crazy Twist play.
Interesting yet challenging levels, easy to play but hard to master. With simple graphics and cool music will help you to relax your mind and play to heart full like the funny mobile game. I’m sure you going to feel more relax and entertaining after playing this game. All you have to do is just press an install button and step into the craziness of Crazy Twist.
Story seems to be interesting that how much pins you’ll get to hit the crazy ball at right place without colliding with other crazy pins.
How many circles you can pass through? How many dots can you shoot and pin in speeding circle?
Pin Circle Pro is simple but addictive game which will keep you hooked on for days.
Pin circle Pro looks simple but it’s a very complex game because of its different speed of circle. Play till end of level and challenge your friends to judge their skills too and be a winner among best.

HOW TO PLAY: 

Tap on screen to shoot black crazy pin in the circle.
Each level will have some black dots to pin in circle. To complete level successfully pin all the dots coming on screen over wheel to complete the level.
Look and observe carefully before triggering the crazy pin into the circle because rotational circle’s speed can be changed.

GAME FEATURES: 
An Addictive and Crazy game play
Different speed of wheels and Pins
Mind relaxing and Stress reliever
Game for players of every age
Easy to play Difficult to master
Build challenge accepting skills in kids especially
